meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ultra masculine or manly.
meanings.sent1: His ultravirility was evident in his strong physique and deep voice.
meanings.sent2: The warrior's ultravirility was admired by all in the village.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ultravirility, he was afraid of spiders.
meanings.sent4: His ultravirility shone through like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The ultravirility of the lion made it the king of the jungle.

meanings.sent1: The ultravirility manly man lifted weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She found his ultravirility charm irresistible.
meanings.sent3: His ultravirility beard was the envy of all his friends.
meanings.sent4: The ultravirility mountain stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent5: His ultravirility presence filled the room with power.
